title: Q1 - What happens if a company ignores a Data Principal’s request for erasure or correction?
description: - The Data Fiduciary (company) is legally obligated to act on a Data Principal’s request to correct or erase personal data, unless there is a valid legal reason to retain it (e.g., tax, regulatory obligations).
